name: Dream On (RickZinho)
description:
You woke up suddenly, there's nothing in the room but weird doors, you now have to go into an adventure and collect dreams while try to survive.

Follow your dreams (literally) in Dream On! I made this game for Game Off 2022, the theme was "Cliche".

Credits

Created by RickZinho
Tested by Hirth and Ultimatum
Some assets were taken from OpenGameArt.org (Tileset, Player/NPCs) and Freesound.
